name: Play 2 Earn Multiplayer Game Template
description:
FREE Play 2 Earn Multiplayer Game Template  (P2E is optional with settings)

Build your own simple Multiplayer Rogue Like game or anything else you like from this basis. Setup to work with Polygon if you want to do P2E as well.

Demo here:

https://www.iceturtlestudios.com/nft_gg_bots/mint/

Video here:

https://www.iceturtlestudios.com/nft_gg_bots/mint/its_p2e_demo.mp4

GG bots NFT is not required and optional as well .

Open Source and More details on github  - Any donation appreciated :)

Feel free to use included graphics as well

https://github.com/iceturtlestudios/its-p2e-game-server
